Thaumaturgy 2

Scrying Pool
Ritual
W2
spell id [id]: 987
effect number [effect_number]: 85
damage [damage]: 36
range [provrange]: 5 provinces
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 2W
Remote Enchant Province - Gem Duration:36 ?
Hidden Enchantment :1
The mage will enchant a pool of water to provide images of a province far away. The more magic gems spent on the scrying pool, the longer it will last. The information gained by scrying is much more accurate than a normal scout can provide.
